<p style="text-align:right;margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Emerging growth company<span style="margin-left:36pt;"></span><span style="font-family:Segoe UI Symbol;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000018" name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany" contextRef="C_0000040704_20210630_20210630" format="ixt-sec:boolballotbox">&#9744;</ix:nonNumeric></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On June 30, 2021, General Mills, Inc. issued a press release reporting financial results for its fourth quarter and fiscal year ended May 30, 2021.&#160;&#160;A copy of the press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99 and incorporated herein by reference.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The information furnished in Item 2.02 of this Current Report on Form 8-K and Exhibit 99 attached hereto shall not be deemed to be filed for the purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, or otherwise subject to liabilities of that Section or Sections 11 and 12(a)(2) of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and shall not be deemed to be incorporated by reference into any registration statement or other document filed pursuant to the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;line-height:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Exhibit 99<font style="font-weight:normal;margin-left:36pt;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:6.67%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">June 30, 2021</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-right:4.07%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">GENERAL MILLS REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS FOR FISCAL 2021 AND PROVIDES FISCAL 2022 OUTLOOK</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="text-decoration:underline;">Full Year Highlights</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net sales of $18.1 billion increased 3 percent from the prior year; organic net sales&#185; were up 4 percent.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Operating profit increased 6 percent to $3.1 billion; constant-currency adjusted operating profit was up 2 percent.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Diluted EPS of $3.78 were up 6 percent; adjusted diluted EPS of $3.79 increased 4 percent in constant currency.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">The company resumed dividend growth and share repurchase activity; total cash returned to shareholders increased 29 percent to $1.5 billion.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="text-decoration:underline;">Fourth Quarter Highlights</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net sales declined 10 percent to $4.5 billion and organic net sales were down 6 percent, reflecting the comparison against the surge in at-home food demand at the outset of the pandemic in the prior year.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Operating profit of $548 million was down 34 percent; constant-currency adjusted operating profit was down 18 percent.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:'Times New Roman'">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Diluted earnings per share (EPS) of $0.68 declined 33 percent; adjusted diluted EPS of $0.91 were down 19 percent in constant currency.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;"><a name="_Hlk500850298"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#185; Please see Note 7 to the Consolidated Financial Statements below for reconciliation of this and other non-GAAP measures used in this release. <font style="font-style:normal;"> </font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> <font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font><font style="font-size:11pt;">MINNEAPOLIS, Minn., June 30, 2021 &#8211; General Mills (NYSE: GIS) today reported results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended May 30, 2021.&nbsp;&nbsp;Fiscal 2021 results reflect the impact of one fewer week compared to fiscal 2020.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:6.67%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Hlk44347727"></a>&#8220;I&#8217;m pleased with the results the General Mills team delivered in fiscal 2021 under difficult circumstances,&#8221; said General Mills Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Jeff Harmening.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#8220;We competed effectively, generated strong top- and bottom-line growth, and further improved our balance sheet, allowing us to resume dividend growth and share repurchases.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, we advanced our Accelerate strategy by investing in our brands, strengthening our capabilities, building on our leading position as a force for good, and taking significant steps to reshape our portfolio and our organization for future growth. </p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;line-height:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:6.67%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;We enter fiscal 2022 ready to compete and win in a highly dynamic consumer environment.&nbsp;&nbsp;We&#8217;re taking actions to address near-term cost pressures while remaining focused on the long-term growth opportunities we</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> will</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> capture through our Accelerate strategy.&#8221;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:6.67%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:6.67%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">General Mills is executing its Accelerate strategy to drive sustainable, profitable growth and top-tier shareholder returns over the long term.&nbsp;&nbsp;The strategy focuses on four pillars to create competitive advantages and win:&nbsp;&nbsp;boldly building brands, relentlessly innovating, unleashing scale, and being a force for good.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company is prioritizing its core markets, global platforms, and local gem brands that have the best prospects for profitable growth and is committed to reshaping its portfolio with strategic acquisitions and divestitures, including the acquisition of Tyson Foods&#8217; pet treats business and the proposed divestiture of its European Yoplait operations, to further enhance its growth profile.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:6.67%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">General Mills expects that changes in consumer behaviors driven by the COVID-19 pandemic will result in ongoing elevated consumer demand for food at home, relative to pre-pandemic levels.&nbsp;&nbsp;These changes include more time spent working from home and increased consumer appreciation for cooking and baking.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company plans to capitalize on these opportunities, addressing evolving consumer needs through its leading brands, innovation, and advantaged capabilities to generate profitable growth.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="text-decoration:underline;">Fourth Quarter Results Summary</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net sales</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> declined 10 percent to $4.5 billion, including a 5-point headwind from an extra week of results in last year&#8217;s fourth quarter and 2 points of favorable foreign currency exchange.&nbsp;&nbsp;Organic net sales were down 6 percent, driven by lower organic pound volume reflecting the comparison against the surge in at-home food demand at the outset of the pandemic in the prior year.&nbsp;&nbsp;On a 2-year compound growth basis, relative to pre-pandemic levels, fourth-quarter organic net sales were up 4 percent.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Gross margin</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> was down 20 basis points to 35.0 percent of net sales, driven by higher input costs, partially offset by a mark-to-market gain compared to a loss in the prior year and comparison against a product recall charge in the prior year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted gross margin decreased 160 basis points to 34.5 percent, primarily driven by unfavorable manufacturing leverage.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Operating profit </font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">of $548 million was down 34 percent, driven by lower gross profit dollars,</font><font style="color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">higher restructuring charges, and a loss on the sale of the Latic&#237;nios Carolina yogurt business in Brazil, partially offset by lower selling, general, and administrative (SG&amp;A) expenses</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Operating profit margin</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> of 12.1 percent was down 440 basis points.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted operating profit of $740 million was down 18 percent in constant currency, primarily driven by lower constant-currency adjusted gross profit dollars, partially offset by lower SG&amp;A expenses.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted operating profit margin was down 140 basis points to 16.3 percent.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net earnings attributable to General Mills</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> were down 33 percent to $417 million and </font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">diluted EPS</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> were down 33 percent to $0.68, primarily reflecting lower operating profit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted diluted EPS of $0.91 were down 19 percent in constant currency, primarily reflecting lower adjusted operating profit.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;line-height:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="text-decoration:underline;">Full Year Results Summary</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net sales</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> increased 3 percent to $18.1 billion, driven by higher organic net sales and 1 point of favorable foreign currency exchange, partially offset by a 2-point headwind from an extra week of results in last year&#8217;s fourth quarter.&nbsp;&nbsp;Organic net sales increased 4 percent, reflecting strong execution and broad-based market share gains amid elevated at-home food demand resulting from the pandemic.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Gross margin</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> was up 80 basis points to 35.6 percent of net sales, primarily driven by favorable net price realization and mix, lower mark-to-market expenses, and lower restructuring charges in cost of sales, partially offset by higher input costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted gross margin was down 40 basis points to 34.8 percent of net sales, primarily driven by input cost inflation, costs to secure incremental capacity, and higher logistics costs, partially offset by Holistic Margin Management (HMM) cost savings and favorable manufacturing leverage.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Operating profit </font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">of $3.1 billion was up 6 percent, primarily driven by higher gross profit dollars and favorable net corporate investment activity, partially offset by higher restructuring charges, a loss on the sale of the Latic&#237;nios Carolina yogurt business in Brazil, and higher other SG&amp;A expenses, including higher investment in media and capabilities</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Operating profit margin</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> of 17.3 percent was up 50 basis points.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted operating profit of $3.2 billion increased 2 percent in constant currency, primarily driven by higher constant-currency adjusted gross profit dollars, partially offset by higher SG&amp;A expenses, including increased investment in media and capabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted operating profit margin increased 10 basis points to 17.4 percent.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#8226;</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">Net earnings attributable to General Mills</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> were up 7 percent to $2.3 billion and </font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;color:#000000;">diluted EPS</font><font style="font-size:11pt;color:#000000;"> were up 6 percent to $3.78, primarily reflecting higher operating profit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjusted diluted EPS of $3.79 were up 4 percent in constant currency, primarily reflecting higher adjusted operating profit, lower net interest expense, and higher after-tax earnings from joint ventures, partially offset by a higher adjusted effective tax rate and higher average diluted shares outstanding.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="text-decoration:underline;">Operating Segment Results</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note:&nbsp;&nbsp;Tables may not foot due to rounding.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Asia &amp; Latin America</p></td>
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">NM</p></td>
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">NM</p></td>
</tr>
<tr style="height:1pt;">
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Total</p></td>
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(19)%</p></td>
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(20)%</p></td>
</tr>
<tr style="height:1pt;">
<td valign="bottom"  style=" border-top:double 2.5pt #000000; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Full Year</p></td>
<td valign="middle"  style=" border-top:double 2.5pt #000000; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">

<td valign="top"  style=" border-top:double 2.5pt #000000; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-left:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-right:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
